Package vinyl

Class AggregateAPI.Aggs<T>

java.lang.Object
vinyl.AggregateAPI.Aggs<T>
Type Parameters:
T - the intermediate result type
Enclosing class:
AggregateAPI
public class AggregateAPI.Aggs<T> extends Object
A sub-configurator used to define fields of an aggregate operation that depend on a common intermediate aggregation result.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    <U> AggregateAPI.Aggs<T>
    aggField(Field<U> field, Function<? super T,? extends U> mapper)
    Defines (or redefines) a field as the application of the given function to this sub-configurator's intermediate aggregation result.
